mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO channel_visit_summary ( district_id, block_id, residence_id, channel_no, mac, pv, begin_time, end_time, total_top ) VALUES
(#{channelVisitSummary.districtId}, #{channelVisitSummary.blockId}, #{channelVisitSummary.residenceId}, #{channelVisitSummary.channelNo}, #{channelVisitSummary.mac}, #{channelVisitSummary.pv}, #{channelVisitSummary.beginTime}, #{channelVisitSummary.endTime}, #{channelVisitSummary.totalTop})
